Who I am...

Hi!, Welcome to my portfolio üëèüëèüëè. I'm a fullstack web developer based in the beautiful city of Miami, FL.

I love CSS and JavaScript, which along with other tools and technologies I create clean and beautiful user interfaces and websites. I'm very pasionate of what I do, so I guess that's the secrete to success and commitment.

I started my journey as a web developer in 2016 when I had the opportunity to move to the United Stated. Comming from a third wold country where there is minimun professional opportunities have giving me the drive and passion to develop a carrier I always dreamt of.
